title: North Kesteven
summary: North Kesteven is a local government district in the East Midlands. Just over 100 miles (160Â km) north of London, it is east of Nottingham and south of Lincoln. North Kesteven is one of seven districts in Lincolnshire, England and is in the centre of the county. Its council, North Kesteven District Council, is based in Sleaford in the former offices of Kesteven County Council.
